approve.description: Sets the amount of tokens that an address can spend on behalf of the token owner.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens from the caller to a specified address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from a specified address to another address, using the allowance mechanism.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the amount of tokens that an address can spend on behalf of the token owner.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the amount of tokens that an address can spend on behalf of the token owner.

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR.description: Returns the domain separator used in EIP-712.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that an address is allowed to spend on behalf of the token owner.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specific address.

checkpoints.description: Returns the checkpoint details for a given address and position.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.

delegate.description: Delegates voting power to a specific address.

delegates.description: Returns the delegatee of a specific address.

getPastTotalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens at a specific block number.

getPastVotes.description: Returns the number of votes of an address at a specific block number.

getRoleAdmin.description: Returns the admin role that manages a specific role.

getVotes.description: Returns the number of votes of a specific address.

grantRole.description: Grants a role to an address.

hasRole.description: Checks if an address has a specific role.

mint.description: Mints new tokens and assigns them to an address.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

nonces.description: Returns the nonce of a specific address.

numCheckpoints.description: Returns the number of checkpoints for a specific address.

renounceRole.description: Renounces a role for an address.

revokeRole.description: Revokes a role from an address.

supportsInterface.description: Checks if the contract supports a specific interface.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.
